name: Monkey Biz
description:
Year: A.A.E.E.OO

Location: Monkey Island

After global warming has affected all of Monkey Island, a miracle occurred. A giant banana fell from the sky! Although it broke into pieces, this left our monkey friends wondering... is this a chance to save your colony from starvation?

This is a submission for Game Off 2022.

Controls Mouse: R-Click for attack W/Space: Jump A/D: Move Left/Right S: Move Down

Good luck out there! Hope you have a Monki-tastic time :)

Credits Allan TazProgrammingAmie TrangUX/UI/Visual Design
